text: IGAWorks reported on March 15 that the monthly average number of Netflix users in South Korea was 10,013,283 last month, up 113 percent compared to January 2020. When it comes to domestic OTT platforms, wavve recorded 3,948,950, followed by TVing (2,649,509), U+ Mobile TV (2,126,608), Seezn (1,683,471) and WATCHA (1,385,303). According to IGAWorks, the daily average number of Netflix users in South Korea was 2,521,139 on Feb. 1, 2021, up 190 percent from a year ago. That day, the ratio of use to app installation of Netflix was 72.7 percent, the highest of those of the OTT services. The average ratio of users using Netflix along with the domestic OTT apps was over 40 percent. Especially, that of those using Netflix and WATCHA at the same time amounted to 65.5 percent. That of those using Netflix without using any of the domestic services was 43.4 percent. Never miss another article! Enter your email address below to receive our free daily newsletter:
title: Netflix Still Unrivaled in South Korea - Businesskorea
